content.question: Which of the following statements best describes the role of adenylyl cyclase in the epinephrine signaling pathway?

choices.label: It converts a polymer to its monomer subunits.
It moves substances across the plasma membrane.
It accelerates the production of a second messenger.
It transfers phosphate groups from <math alttext="A T P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>ATP</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> to protein substrates.

content.answer: It accelerates the production of a second messenger.

skill.text: 2.A: Describe characteristics of visual representations of biological concepts and processes.
